job.description: Holtsville New YorkbrbrstrongSkills  strongPython software developerPythondeveloperpython developerSoftware engineerSoftwareEngineerAutomationAutomative engineerbrbrstronguDescriptionbrbrustrongstrongPosition DetailsbrbrstrongstrongJob Titlestrongstrong  strongstrongSoftware Engineer IbrbrstrongstrongLocationstrongstrong  strongstrongHoltsville NYbrbrstrongstrongDurationstrongstrong  strongstrong4 Months Possible ExtensionbrbrstrongstronguDescriptionbrustrongulliThe tasking involves setting up and programming a Universal Robotic UR arm and gripper to pick up grocery items and move them across the plane of a scanner as performed by a human checkerliliThe UR robot and table are large so this tasking would be in the Holtsville FacilityliliFor safety and security reasons this tasking cant be fully performed remotely and the candidate would need to be in officeliliThe sample set of test items is largeliliSome training is involved but the candidate must have some experience with robots and robotic control so the training is limitedbrliulstronguRequired SkillsbrustrongulliDevelops and implements software systems or applications through the use of software best practices such as Specification Design Coding Testing Documentation and MaintenanceliliKnowledge of Development Environments Configuration Management Tools and Operating systems is expectedliliBachelors degree in an appropriate engineering discipline requiredliliMinimum of 02 years of engineering experienceliliSome experience in PythonScript programming and Robotsliul
